title: Ellie Kemper shares first snap of new tot: 'Happy 1-Month Birthday to baby boy, Matthew!'
text:
They already share a three-year-old son.

And Ellie Kemper and husband Michael Koman are now also the proud parents of baby Matthew, a brother for James.

On Saturday the Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt actress, 39, shared a delightful Instagram snap of the nearly newborn tot snoozing quietly in a carrier on her chest.

Her second boy: On Saturday Ellie Kemper, 39, shared an Instagram snap of her tot snoozing in a carrier on her chest captioned, 'Happy 1-Month Birthday to our baby boy, Matthew!'

She captioned it: 'Happy 1-Month Birthday to our baby boy, Matthew!

'He has inherited his dad’s brown hair and his mom’s desire to be carried around all day in a baby sling. He’s a good boy,' and she added two heart emojis.

Ellie appeared to be make up free, showing off her clear complexion as she smiled at the camera.

The Office star and her 42-year-old writer husband have been married since 2012.

Big brother : Ellie and her writer husband Michael Koman are also the proud parents of three-year-old James.

They tied the knot quietly in New York City in front of friends including Kristen Wiig and Ellie's Office co-star Mindy Kaling.

Meanwhile, Ellie has been filming an interactive special TV movie featuring the characters from The Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt.

She co-stars with regulars including Daniel Radcliffe, Jane Krakowski and Tituss Burgess.

Happy couple: Ellie and Michael at the Primetime Emmy Awards at the Microsoft Theater in downtown Los Angeles on September 17, before baby no. 2 came along

Described as being in post-production in IMDB, there is no information about the story as yet or when it will be released.

However, Ellie's comedy The Stand-In is in post-production and is due for release next year.

She co-stars with Drew Barrymore in the story of a disaffected comedy actress and her ambitious stand-in who trade places.
description: The Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt actress, 39, and her writer husband, 42, introduced the world to their second son, month-old Matthew, who is a brother for their toddler James, on Saturday.
